title: ABC to pay $15M to Trump library to settle lawsuit, documents show
shortDescription: ABC News has agreed to give $15 million to U.S. President-elect Donald Trump’s presidential library to settle a lawsuit.

title: Trump, RFK Jr. set sights on childhood vaccines program, autism
shortDescription: Skyrocketing rates of autism have led some to implicate childhood vaccines, though research has consistently cleared the shots.

title: South Korea's Yoon defiant after impeachment over martial law bid
shortDescription: The Constitutional Court will decide whether to remove Yoon sometime in the next six months. If he is removed from office, a snap election will be called.

title: Trump has plan for drone problem: Shoot em down!
shortDescription: Sen. Andy Kim, D-NJ, went to Hunterdon County to observe drones and reported that he met with local law enforcement at Round Valley Reservoir.

title: How Biden is trying to Trump-proof his legacy
shortDescription: Before giving way to Donald Trump, President Biden is daring the GOP to eliminate his biggest wins and trying to take actions to preserve his agenda.

title: No, Canada did not bar Donald Trump from entering | Fact check
shortDescription: Donald Trump's felony convictions do not mean the president-elect must stay out of Canada. Visiting may just require additional paperwork.

title: Hello darkness? Trump announces push to end daylight saving time
shortDescription: President-elect Trump vowed to work to eliminate daylight saving time, calling it "inconvenient" and "very costly."

title: It’s Beau, not Hunter, in 1973 photo of Biden taking oath | Fact check
shortDescription: The image shows Biden’s son Beau, not Hunter. It was taken in 1973 when Biden was sworn in to the Senate in a Delaware hospital.

title: OpenAI joins other tech leaders in donating to Trump inauguration
shortDescription: Altman's announcement comes after both Meta and Amazon announced plans to contribute $1 million to the inauguration.

title: Biden grants clemency to Pa. judge in 'kids for cash' scandal
shortDescription: Michael Conahan was sentenced to 17½ years in the judicial scandal, which the FBI described as the “worst in Pennsylvania’s history.”

title: Georgia judge upholds Trump co-defendant's guilty plea in election case
shortDescription: The judge's ruling nixes effort by Kenneth Chesebro, a Trump election lawyer in 2020, to say his guilty plea violated his right to due process.

title: Supreme Court takes tax case related to Catholic groups helping disabled people
shortDescription: The case the court agreed to hear involves groups affiliated with the Catholic church that serve people with developmental and mental health disabilities.

title: Xi Jingping not expected to appear at Trump inauguration: reports
shortDescription: China's ambassador to the U.S. is expected to lead a delegation of senior officials at Trump's Jan. 20 ceremony, instead of President Xi Jinping.

title: Trump invites China's Xi Jinping, other foreign leaders to inauguration
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump packed his inauguration guest list with world leaders to witness his swearing-in as the 47th U.S. president.

title: Laura Ingraham calls on Taylor Swift to perform at Trump inauguration
shortDescription: Fox News host Laura Ingraham called on international popstar Taylor Swift to perform at President-elect Donald Trump’s inauguration in January.

title: Trudeau, Canadian officials meet to discuss Trump's tariff threat
shortDescription: Trump's pledge to impose steep tariffs on Canada and Mexico is raising fears of a trade war between the US and two of its biggest trading partners.

title: Jimmy Carter to miss Trump inauguration for health reasons
shortDescription: This will be the second inauguration missed by the 100-year-old former president. Other living ex-presidents have yet to announce their plans.

title: Dr. Oz's stock holdings pose controversy
shortDescription: Dr. Mehmet Oz is President-elect Donald Trump's pick to run the Centers for Medicare and Medicare Services.
